meanings.definition: A chemical compound consisting of two chlorine atoms attached to a benzene ring.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of dichlorobenzenes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use dichlorobenzenes to protect their crops from pests.
meanings.sent3: The dichlorobenzenes threw a party in the beaker, inviting all the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: The dichlorobenzenes acted like bodyguards, protecting the benzene ring from intruders.
meanings.sent5: In the world of chemicals, dichlorobenzenes are like twins with matching chlorine jackets.

meanings.definition: Dichlorobenzenes are commonly used as pesticides and solvents.
meanings.sent1: The farmers sprayed the fields with dichlorobenzenes to keep the bugs away.
meanings.sent2: Factories rely on dichlorobenzenes for their cleaning and manufacturing processes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pests dared each other to touch the forbidden dichlorobenzenes.
meanings.sent4: The dichlorobenzenes worked tirelessly, dissolving dirt and grime with ease.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the sharp scent of dichlorobenzenes, signaling a job well done.
